### Week 2: Case Study

**Gapminder Part 1**

```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(tidyverse)
#install.packages("gapminder")
library(gapminder)
```



```{r, fig.width=10}
# Load the libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)

# Remove Kuwait from the data
data <- gapminder %>%
  filter(country != "Kuwait")

ggplot(data, aes(y = gdpPercap, x = lifeExp, color = continent, size = pop)) +

  geom_point(alpha = 0.7) +
  scale_size_continuous(
    range = c(1, 10),  
    name = "Population (100k)", 
    breaks = c(250000000, 500000000, 750000000, 1000000000, 1250000000),
    labels = c("2500", "5000", "7500", "10000", "12500"),
  ) +  

  scale_y_continuous(trans = "sqrt") +
  theme_bw() +
  facet_wrap(~year, nrow = 1) +  
  labs(
    
    y = "GDP per Capita",
    x = "Life Expectancy",
    color = "Continent"
  )

```
